    public class MeshImageStack
extends Object

      • scaleToNormalizedLength

        public double[] scaleToNormalizedLength(double[] l)
        given a length in px, px, slices this scales the length to normalized coordinate values.
        Parameters:
        l - px, px, slices (x,y,z lengths in image slices)
        Returns:
        scaled value.

      • getNormalizedCoordinate

        public double[] getNormalizedCoordinate(double[] r)
        Finds the position in normalized coordinates using.
        Parameters:
        r - location in px,px,slice
        Returns:
        normalized coordinates where center of image is at 0 and the longest axis in real units is -0.5 0.5.

      • getImageCoordinates

        public double[] getImageCoordinates(double[] r)
        Returns x, y, z in (px, px, slice) indexes of the backing data array. The z index is in slices, but 0 indexed compared to the 1 indexed method in the ImagePlus.
        Parameters:
        r - x, y, z in normalized coordinates.
        Returns:
        closest double representation to the provided point in image coordinate space.

      • getCurrentFrame

        public ij.ImagePlus getCurrentFrame()
        Returns a single channel image plus of the current frame.
        Returns:
        ImagePlus created by the original image contain one channel, all of the slices and a single time frame. Duplicate processors.
